name: Stonecrop Overload
description:
Stonecrop Overload

Wikus is no stranger to over-demanding jobs and will do anything to support his struggling family, but while working 5 days at the Stonecrop Research Facility, he finds that concealing confidential alien information is a task harder than he had imagined.

Game:

  • Complete 5 days of preventing information about aliens from surfacing by not making too many mistakes.
  • Survive each day as it becomes more chaotic, while balancing new tasks and challenges.
  • Unravel Wikus’s story in a short, yet intense experience.

Controls:

  • Turn: [A] / [D]
  • Interact: [LMB]
  • Magnify: [LMB] on sticky note

Credits:

  • Garreth Botha - programming, audio, game design
  • Hayden Botha - visuals, UI, game design
